com.ooyala.android.item

Interface AuthorizableItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Channel, ChannelSet, ContentItem, DynamicChannel, OoyalaAdSpot, Video

    public interface AuthorizableItem
    Stores the info and metatdata for the specified movie.

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthorized

        boolean isAuthorized()
        Whether or not this AuthorizableItem is authorized
        Returns:
        true if authorized, false if not

      • getAuthCode

        int getAuthCode()
        The Auth Code from the authorization request
        Returns:
        an int with the status of the authorization request

      • update

        com.ooyala.android.item.JSONUpdatableItem.ReturnState update(JSONObject data)
        Update the AuthorizableItem using the specified data
        Parameters:
        data - the data to use to update this AuthorizableItem
        Returns:
        a ReturnState based on if the data matched or not (or parsing failed)

      • embedCodesToAuthorize

        List<String> embedCodesToAuthorize()
        For internal use only. The embed codes to authorize for the AuthorizableItemInternal
        Returns:
        the embed codes to authorize as a List
